PulseAlertWriter - Interface in com.microfocus.adm.pulse.pluginapi.chain
Provides a means for a PulseChainStepPlugin to report messages in the activity feed within Pulse.
PulseAlertWriterAware - Interface in com.microfocus.adm.pulse.pluginapi.chain

PulseChainAbortMonitor - Interface in com.microfocus.adm.pulse.pluginapi.chain
Allows a PulseChainStepPlugin to check to see if the chain has been aborted and allow it to stop processing the step.
PulseChainAbortMonitorAware - Interface in com.microfocus.adm.pulse.pluginapi.chain
Implement to receive the PulseChainAbortMonitor instance to use to detect when a chain step plugin should prematurely stop processing the current step because the user has asked for the chain to stop.

PulseChainStepConfigAware<CONFIG_TYPE> - Interface in com.microfocus.adm.pulse.pluginapi.chain
If a PulseChainStepPlugin needs configuration from the step it can use this interface to receive the configuration as a Java POJO.
PulseChainStepPlugin - Interface in com.microfocus.adm.pulse.pluginapi.chain
Every chain step plugin implemented in Java must provide an implementation of this interface which is used to ask the plugin to inspect one or more changesets.
PulseChainStepPluginDefinition - Annotation Type in com.microfocus.adm.pulse.pluginapi.chain.annotations
Annotation that should be applied to Java implementations of PulseChainStepPlugin to provide default values for groupId, pluginId, version, displayName and description so that the plugin descriptor file, plugin.json, only needs to contain the plugin's className.
PulseChainStepPluginException - Exception in com.microfocus.adm.pulse.pluginapi.chain
General exception that can be thrown by an expert or the Pulse plugin framework when an exception has occurred.
